Song.title: Grace And Peace
Song.copyright: Â© 2013 Sovereign Grace Worship Words & Music by Joel Sczebel

Arrangement.text:
Verse 1: [A]Grace and peace, oh [F#m]how can this be For [E]lawbreakers and thieves, for the w[F#m]orthless, the l[D]east [A]You have said that our [F#m]judgment is death For [E]all eternity without [F#m]hope, without [D]rest [D]Oh, what an am[F#m]azing m[E]yster[D]y, what an am[F#m]azing m[E]yster[D]y That Your [E]grace has come to [A]me [F#m | D | A F#m | D]
Verse 2: [A]Grace and peace, oh [F#m]how can this be? The m[E]atchless King of all{,} paid the bl[F#m]ood price for m[D]e [A]Slaughtered lamb, what at[F#m]onement You bring! The v[E]ilest sinner's heart{,} can be cl[F#m]eansed, can be fr[D]ee [D]Oh, what an am[F#m]azing m[E]yster[D]y, what an am[F#m]azing m[E]yster[D]y That Your gr[E]ace has come [||:]to m[A]e [F#m | D | A F#m | D :|| ]
Verse 3: [A]Grace and peace, oh h[F#m]ow can this be? Let s[E]ongs of gratefulness{,} ever r[F#m]ise, never c[D]ease [A]Loved by God and c[F#m]alled as a saint My h[E]eart is satisfied in the r[F#m]iches of Chr[D]ist [D]Oh, what an a[F#m]mazing m[E]yster[D]y, what an a[F#m]mazing m[E]yster[D]y That Your [E]grace has come to [D]me [F#m | E A | D F#m | E]
Tag: [A]Oh, what an amazing love I [D]see, what an amazing love I [F#m]see That Your grace has come to [E]me
Outro: [D F#m | E A | D F#m | D] [D F#m | E A | D F#m | D | A]
Arrangement.searchtext: verse 1 grace and peace oh how can this be for lawbreakers and thieves for the worthless the least you have said that our judgment is death for all eternity without hope without rest oh what an amazing mystery what an amazing mystery that your grace has come to me verse 2 grace and peace oh how can this be the matchless king of all paid the blood price for me slaughtered lamb what atonement you bring the vilest sinners heart can be cleansed can be free oh what an amazing mystery what an amazing mystery that your grace has come to me verse 3 grace and peace oh how can this be let songs of gratefulness ever rise never cease loved by god and called as a saint my heart is satisfied in the riches of christ oh what an amazing mystery what an amazing mystery that your grace has come to me tag oh what an amazing love i see what an amazing love i see that your grace has come to me outro
